```{r}
library(igraph)
```

```{r}
fulldata <- read.csv("peoplepickinganonymised.csv")
```

```{r}
formatrix <- fulldata[,4:63]
matrix <- as.matrix(formatrix)
```

```{r}
G <- graph_from_adjacency_matrix(matrix, mode = "directed",add.colnames = TRUE, diag=FALSE)
```

```{r}
coords <- layout_(G, nicely())
plot(G, vertex.size=12, edge.arrow.size=0.2)
```


```{r}
coords <- layout_(G, nicely())
plot(G, layout = layout_randomly, vertex.size=12, edge.arrow.size=0.2)
```

```{r}
l <- layout_on_sphere(G)
plot(G, layout=l, vertex.size=15, edge.arrow.size=0.2, edge.width=0.2)
```
